teaser: Video streaming company Netflix announces earnings today. The expectations are high among investors. But the company has challenges, like growing the brand abroad. We assess the Netlfix State of the Union. Verizon is buying a live TV and video streaming service a week after a controversial court ruling. And, a look at cloud computing for robots.
description: Video streaming company Netflix announces earnings today. The expectations are high among investors. But the company has challenges, like growing the brand abroad. We assess the Netlfix State of the Union. Verizon is buying a live TV and video streaming service a week after a controversial court ruling. And, a look at cloud computing for robots.
title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, January 22, 2014
